source_sentence: 佛說大乘大方廣佛冠經卷上
translation: Foshuo dasheng dafangguang foguan jing shoushang

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試鴻臚卿傳梵大師賜紫沙門臣法護等奉　詔譯如是我聞：一時，世尊在王舍城鷲峯山中，與大苾芻眾千二百五十人俱，皆是阿羅漢，諸漏已盡。
translation: The Western Heaven Translation Tripiṭaka was translated by imperial order from the purple ascetic Hōshō, who was bestowed by the Minister of Brahmā, Hōshō, and others.

source_sentence: 復有諸大菩薩之眾，慈氏菩薩、妙吉祥菩薩而為上首，并餘無數天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆，及持明仙天女眾等。
translation: There was also a great assembly of bodhisattvas, headed by Maitreya Bodhisattva and Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva, and countless other gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, and sages and goddesses who held the light.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告尊者大迦葉言：「迦葉！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed Venerable Mahākāśyapa, saying, "Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 我今為令諸初發心菩薩，成熟一切善根故，有所宣說；汝等諦聽，極善作意。」
translation: Now, I've explained this for the sake of causing bodhisattvas who have just begun to arouse their minds to mature all good roots; listen closely, and pay very good attention."

source_sentence: 時大迦葉白佛言：「善哉！
translation: The Mahākāśyapa then said to the Buddha, "Good!

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 受教而聽。」
translation: Accept the teaching and listen."

source_sentence: 佛言：「迦葉！
translation: The Buddha said, "Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 東方去此佛剎，過一殑伽沙數等世界，有世界名曰定嚴，其土有佛，號定手最上吉祥如來、應供、正等正覺，今現住彼教化利益。
translation: In the east, one sands away from this buddha-base, there's a world named Ding Yan, and there's a buddha there named Ding Hands, the Most Auspicious Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened, who now lives there to teach and benefit.

source_sentence: 其佛剎中有菩薩摩訶薩，名離塵步，次補彼佛，當成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提果，號常定手最上吉祥如來、應供、正等正覺，出現世間。
translation: In that buddha-stage there's a bodhisattva Mahāsattva named Padmavṛṣabhavikrāmin, who next complements that Buddha and will soon attain the fruit of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, and who's called the Ever-adorned Hand, the Most Auspicious Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Perfectly Enlightened, and who appears in the world.

source_sentence: 「迦葉！
translation: "Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 若有住菩薩乘諸善男子及善女人，聞是定手最上吉祥如來名號，及離塵步菩薩摩訶薩名號，能稱念受持者，是人轉生得宿命智，百劫之中背於生死，而能攝集無量福蘊，近證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提果。
translation: If there are good men and good women who abide in the bodhisattva vehicle and hear this name of the Most Excellent Auspicious Tathāgata who is the hand of meditation and this name of the bodhisattva Mahāsattva who is free from defilement and can recite and uphold them, that person will be reborn with knowledge of past lives, turn away from birth-and-death for a hundred eons, and be able to gather measureless merit and nearly realize the fruit of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「復次，迦葉！
translation: "Furthermore, Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 東方去此佛剎，過二殑伽沙數等世界，有世界名大菩提場莊嚴妙愛，其土有佛，號蓮華最上吉祥如來、應供、正等正覺，今現住彼教化利益。
translation: To the east, two sands away from this buddha-base, there's a world called the great site of enlightenment, Adorned with Wonderful Love, where there's a buddha named Lotus, the Most Excellent Auspicious Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Perfectly Enlightened, who now lives there to teach and benefit.

source_sentence: 其佛剎中有菩薩摩訶薩，名蓮華手，次補彼佛，當成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提果，號蓮華上王如來、應供、正等正覺，出現世間。
translation: In that buddha's buddha, there's a bodhisattva Mahāsattva named Lotus Hand, who next complements that Buddha, will soon attain the fruit of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, and is called the Padmasaṃbhava Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened One, who appears in the world.

source_sentence: 「迦葉！
translation: "Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 若有住菩薩乘諸善男子及善女人，聞是蓮華最上吉祥如來、應供、正等正覺名號，及蓮華手菩薩摩訶薩名號，能稱念受持者，是人轉生得宿命智，乃生常得蓮華化生，於諸世間而無染著，超越一切不善之法，猶如蓮華不著於水，當得不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，三十千劫中背於生死，而能攝集無量福蘊，近證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提果。
translation: If there are good men and good women who abide in the bodhisattva vehicle and hear the names of this lotus flower, the most auspicious Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened One, and the name of the lotus-handed bodhisattva Mahāsattva, and who can recite and bear them in mind, that person will be reborn and attain knowledge of past lives, and then will be born and always attain birth by transformation into a lotus flower, be undefiled in the world, transcend all unskillful things, and be like a lotus flower not clinging to water; they will attain irreversibility, unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, and will be able to gather measureless merit and accumulate it while turning their backs on birth-and-death for 30,000 eons, and will nearly realize the fruit of unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「復次，迦葉！
translation: "Furthermore, Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 東方去此佛剎，過三殑伽沙數等世界，有世界名離塵藏，其土有佛，號日輪光明最勝吉祥如來、應供、正等正覺，今現住彼教化利益。
translation: In the east, three sands away from this buddha-base, there's a world named Lijianzang, and in that land there's a buddha named Sun Light, Most Excellent Auspicious Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Enlightened, who now lives there to teach and benefit.

source_sentence: 其佛剎中有菩薩摩訶薩，名日光明，次補彼佛，當成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提果，名諸聖吉祥圓滿最上眾相嚴身如來、應供、正等正覺，出現世間。
translation: In that buddha-stage there's a bodhisattva Mahāsattva named Sun Light, who next complements that Buddha, will become the fruit of unsurpassed, correct, and complete bodhi, and is called the Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Enlightened One who appears in the world with the most auspicious and complete variety of characteristics and adornment.

source_sentence: 「迦葉！
translation: "Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 若有住菩薩乘諸善男子及善女人，聞是日輪光明最勝吉祥如來、應供、正等正覺名號，及日光明菩薩摩訶薩名號，能稱念受持者，是人轉生得宿命智，乘日輪光照諸善法，不復更生墮三惡趣，疑惑怖畏，當得不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，千劫之中背於生死，近證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提果。
translation: If there are good men and good women who abide in the bodhisattva vehicle and hear this name of the most excellent and auspicious Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Awakened One, and the name of the Sunlight Bodhisattva Mahāsattva, who can recite and uphold it, that person will be reborn and attain knowledge of past lives, ride the light of the sun to illuminate good qualities, never again fall into the three bad destinies, doubt and fear, and attain irreversibility, unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, and turn away from birth and death for a thousand eons to nearly realize the fruit of unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「復次，迦葉！
translation: "Furthermore, Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 東方去此佛剎，過四殑伽沙數等世界，有世界名得自在，其土有佛，號一寶蓋最上如來、應供、正等正覺，今現住彼教化利益。
translation: To the east, four sands away from this buddha-base, there's a world named Attainer of Mastery, and in that land there's a buddha named One Treasured Canopy, the supreme tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Enlightened, who now lives there to teach and benefit.

source_sentence: 「迦葉！
translation: "Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 若有住菩薩乘諸善男子及善女人，聞是一寶蓋最上如來、應供、正等正覺名號，能稱念受持者，是人轉生得宿命智，不於下劣族姓中生，不於貧窶族姓中生，在在所生而悉於彼王宮中生，所生之處無母障難、無父障難，無富貴難、無疾病難，當得不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，三十千劫中背於生死，近證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提果。
translation: If there are good men and good women who abide in the bodhisattva vehicle and hear the name of this one jeweled lid of the supreme Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened One, who can recite it and bear it in mind, that person will be reborn and attain knowledge of past lives, won't be born among inferior clans, won't be born among poor clans, will be born in the palace of a king wherever he is born, won't have difficulty with mothers or fathers, won't have difficulty with wealth or disease, will attain irreversibility in the unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, and will turn away from birth and death for 30,000 eons and nearly realize the fruit of the unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「復次，迦葉！
translation: "Furthermore, Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 東方去此佛剎，過五殑伽沙數等世界，有世界名清淨藏，其土有佛號定最上吉祥如來、應供、正等正覺，今現住彼教化利益。
translation: To the east, five sands away from this buddha-base, there's a world named Jingjianzang, where there are buddhas named Ding Zuishengji Tathāgata, Yingxiang, and Zhengzhongjue, who now live there to teach and benefit.

source_sentence: 「迦葉！
translation: "Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 彼定最上吉祥如來、應供、正等正覺，往昔修行菩薩道時發大誓願，願我當來得成佛時，若有住菩薩乘諸善男子及善女人，聞我名號能稱念受持者，是人世世生生常得出家，得出家已而悉獲於千三摩地，一一三摩地中復證百千俱胝那庾多三摩地門，彼之所得諸三摩地永不散失。
translation: "When he was practicing the bodhisattva path in the past, the most auspicious Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Enlightened One, he made a great vow, hoping that when I become a buddha in the future, if there are good men and good women who abide in the bodhisattva vehicle and hear my name and can recite and uphold it, that person will be born forever, always attain home, and after attaining home, they'll all attain a thousand samādhis, and within each of those samādhis, they'll realize the gate of a hundred thousand koṭīs of nayuta samādhi, and the samādhis they attain will never be lost.

source_sentence: 能於過去已入涅槃十千佛所瞻禮聽法，所有現在未來世中見佛聽法，亦復如是，當得不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，世世所生千劫之中背於生死，近證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提果。
translation: Those who could venerate 10,000 buddhas who had already entered nirvāṇa in the past and listen to the Dharma, and those who see the buddhas and listen to the Dharma in the present and future, will likewise attain irreversibility, unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, and will turn away from birth-and-death for a thousand eons in their worldly births to nearly realize the fruit of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「迦葉，若有住菩薩乘諸善男子及善女人，聞是定最上吉祥如來、應供、正等正覺名號，能稱念受持者，是人於彼如是行相所求皆得。
translation: "Kāśyapa, if there are good men and good women who abide in the bodhisattva vehicle and hear the name of this most auspicious Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened One who can recite and uphold it, that person will attain whatever they seek in terms of such conduct.

source_sentence: 「復次，迦葉！
translation: "Furthermore, Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 東方去此佛剎，過六殑伽沙數等世界，有世界名寶莊嚴，其土有佛，號寶輪光明高勝吉祥王如來、應供、正等正覺，今現住彼教化利益。
translation: To the east, six sands away from this buddha-base, there's a world called Jewel Adorned, and in that land there's a buddha named the Wheel of Jewel Light, the Tathāgata of Tall Victory, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Enlightened, who now lives there to teach and benefit.

source_sentence: 「迦葉！
translation: "Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 若有住菩薩乘諸善男子及善女人，聞是寶輪光明高勝吉祥王如來、應供、正等正覺名號，能稱念受持者，是人轉生得宿命智，有念有慧諸相圓滿，當得成就信順之語，獲得無斷語言辯才。
translation: "If there are good men and good women abiding in the bodhisattva vehicle who hear this name of the Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened One of Jewel Light, the Highly Exalted Auspicious King, and who can recite it and bear it in mind, that person will be reborn with knowledge of past lives, have mindfulness and wisdom, and have their characteristics completed, and will then achieve faithful speech and acquire uninterrupted verbal eloquence.

source_sentence: 迦葉！
translation: Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 是人能於天人世間一切辯才之中，不為他所退怯間斷，常得語言辯才無斷。
translation: That person can overcome all the eloquence of gods and humans in the world without being deterred by others, and they'll always attain uninterrupted eloquence in speech.

source_sentence: 又善男子及善女人，若能稱念彼佛名者，是人聽法之時，得佛聖相為現其前，若於諸法昔所未聞，隨所受學，即時獲得無邊俱胝那庾多百千隨轉陀羅尼；又此閻浮提中，一切有情隨所樂求而悉能知，然後如其信解善為說法，當得不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，阿僧祇俱胝那庾多百千劫中背於生死，而能攝集無量福蘊。
translation: Also, if good sons and good women can call on that Buddha's name, that person will hear the teaching and have the Buddha's noble attributes presented to them, and if they follow the teaching they've never heard before and accept it as it is, they'll immediately attain an infinite number of nayuta hundreds of thousands of transformative dhāraṇīs; furthermore, in this Jambudvī, all sentient beings who seek it as they please will be able to know it, and then if they believe and understand it and skillfully explain it, they'll attain irreversibility, unsurpassed, samyak-saṃbodhi, and be able to gather measureless merit aggregates while turning their backs on birth and death over a hundred thousand incalculable eons.

source_sentence: 佛說大乘大方廣佛冠經卷上
translation: Foshuo dasheng dafangguang foguan jing shoushang
